Class SimpleSensor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--SimpleSensor
Direct Known Subclasses:
AveragingSensor, StreamingSensor
public class SimpleSensor
extends java.lang.Object

Instances of this class are used to represent all kinds of sensors. Instances of subclasses of this class represent specialized kinds of sensors.

Constructor
